mapper.sql: ID, CLIENT_NAME, SERVER_NAME, IS_DELETEMARK, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_USER_ID, MODIFY_USER_ID, REF_TAB_ID, REF_TAB_TABLE, REF_TYPE
mapper.select: SELECT cf.* FROM com_file cf inner join yb_drg_result dr on cf.REF_TAB_ID = dr.id WHERE cf.REF_TAB_TABLE = 'yb_drg_result' and dr.applyDateStr = #{applyDateStr} and dr.areaType = #{areaType}
